text: @toddstarnes #coronavirus in our study we have found major problems at drive through food take outside in USA. Major spreading going on. Not so like they say contact less transaction as they say. Same person takes cards swipes and hands over food again and again. Customers no masks or gloves

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
